name: LoFi Space Drifter VR
description:
Game is a prototype.

Three levels, three spaceship

Dodge the block, shoot the spheres and improve your high score.

(local highscore)

(The levels are at the moment random)

Controls:

Right Trigger - Shoot/Select

A/B - Return Main Menu

(Only the right controller is needed)

Would be nice to have some feedback :)

Next update:

- online leaderboard
